item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m a third-year undergraduate student at the University of Edinburgh. I love to make things and learn all things involving math. Research Overview I have broad interests throughout algorithms, distributed systems and programming language theory. Throughout the summer of 2022 I interned with Dr. Philip Wadler, working through Programming Language Foundations in Agda. In my third year I studided at the University of Pennsylvania. I gave a lecture on normalization by evaluation for System T.
